name: @Mark
comment: Bought some instant coffee for a quid from One Below and I’m shook that it’s not the worst thing I’ve ever tasted in my life, it actually tastes okay wow bargain hunter

name: @Tommy
comment: Some of you have 10 Free cards from the $.50 and Dollar Lots. For all you bargain hunters out there, that's how you do it! Not trying to break me down to a dime for 2 of them!

name: @June
comment: Is it too much to find a man that is a bargain hunter but appreciates quality and won’t skimp on dinners out or argue I spend too much on personal appearance? Yes someone exactly like myself WHAT

name: @Oliver
comment: Can’t believe I’ve managed to secure flights to Varadero for just over £200 😅😅 I am a certified bargain hunter

name: @Margaret
comment: With the weather getting better it’s time to get the garden sorted ☀️🍺 I love the one with the fire pit and they are all MASSIVELY REDUCED! Check out these great deals here

name: @Abigail
comment: Solution: my wife should be in charge of buying. Absolute deal hunter that woman, like a bargain bloodhound.
